mutants.original_line: result_string += newlet.lower() if original_string[i].lower() == original_string[i] else newlet.upper()
mutants.mutated_line: result_string -= newlet.lower() if original_string[i].lower() == original_string[i] else newlet.upper()

mutants.original_line: result_string += newlet.lower() if original_string[i].lower() == original_string[i] else newlet.upper()
mutants.mutated_line: result_string += newlet.lower() if original_string[i].lower() != original_string[i] else newlet.upper()
